source:
……お、あれは……甘奈じゃないか？
おはよう、甘奈
translatedstr:
......Oh, isn't that ...... Amana?
Good morning, Amana.

source:
あ、プロデューサーさん！
おはようございまーすっ☆
translatedstr:
Oh, Producer-san!
Good morning!

source:
甘奈は朝でも元気だな。
ルミナスのみんなとはどうだ？
translatedstr:
Amana is still going strong in the morning.
How's it going with everyone at Luminous?

source:
えへへ、素敵な人がいっぱい☆
みんなと仲良くしたいなっ！
translatedstr:
Ehehe, so many nice people☆.
I want to get along with everyone!

source:
オシャレな子もたくさんいるし、
いっぱいお話しするぞ～！
translatedstr:
There are a lot of fashionable kids,
I will talk a lot!

source:
そうか、甘奈ならすぐ仲良くなれるさ。
それじゃあ、一緒に事務所に行こうか
translatedstr:
Oh well, Amana will get along soon enough.
Well, then, let's go to the office together.

source:
うん！　あ、途中でコンビニに寄ってもいいかな？
甜花ちゃんが好きなお菓子の、限定版が出てるんだ
translatedstr:
Oh, can we stop at a convenience store on the way?
There's a limited edition version of Tenka-chan's favorite candy.

source:
ああ、構わないよ。
まだ時間に余裕はあるしな、ゆっくり行こう
translatedstr:
Yeah, that's fine.
We still have plenty of time. Let's take our time.

source:
あっ！　プロデューサーさんだ！
おはよーございまーす！
translatedstr:
Ah! It's the producer!
Good morning!

source:
おお、甘奈。おはよう。
甘奈もこれから事務所に向かうところなのか？
translatedstr:
Good morning, Amana.
Is Amana on her way to the office now too?

source:
うん！　えへへ、行きがけにプロデューサーさんに
会うなんて、今日はいいことがあるかも！
translatedstr:
Yeah! Ehehehe, I asked the producer on the way there.
I can't believe we're meeting. Maybe today will be a good day!

source:
いいことがあるかどうかはわからないが、
せっかくだし、一緒に事務所に行こうか
translatedstr:
I don't know if it's a good thing,
Since we're here, let's go to the office together.

source:
もち！　よーし、今日も一日頑張っちゃうから☆
見ててね、プロデューサーさんっ！
translatedstr:
Mochi! All right, I'm going to work hard all day long!
Watch me, producer!

source:
ああ、期待してるぞ。……そういえば、前に甘奈が
言ってたコンビニ限定のお菓子、また出てたぞ
translatedstr:
Yeah, I'm counting on you. ...... Oh, by the way, I've seen Amana before.
The limited-edition convenience store snacks you mentioned, they're out again.

source:
え、ホント？　気になっちゃうな。
えっと、またコンビニに寄ってもいい……？
translatedstr:
Oh, really? I'm curious.
Um, can I stop by the convenience store again ......?

source:
はは、もちろんだよ。甜花も好きなんだろ？
どうせならみんなの分、買って行くか
translatedstr:
Haha, of course you do, and you like Tenka too, don't you?
I'll buy one for everyone anyway.

source:
えっと、プロデューサーさん。
今、ちょっと……いいかな？
translatedstr:
Um, Producer-san.
Can I just ...... for a minute now?

source:
甘奈か、まだ残ってたんだな。
大丈夫だぞ、どうかしたのか？
translatedstr:
Amana, or you're still here.
I'm fine. What's wrong?

source:
あのね、いつもプロデュースありがとっ！
すっごく感謝してるよ！
translatedstr:
You know, thanks for always producing!
I'm very grateful!

source:
面と向かって言われると、なんだか照れるな……。
俺も甘奈のプロデュースができて嬉しいよ
translatedstr:
It's kind of embarrassing when you say it to my face. ......
I'm glad I got to produce Amana too.

source:
えへへ、嬉しいな。……ちゃんと伝えるの、ちょっと
照れるけど……いつも思ってることなんだよ？
translatedstr:
Ehehe, I'm so glad. ...... to tell you properly, kinda.
I'm embarrassed, but ...... that's what I always think, right?

source:
ああ、甘奈……ありがとうな。
でも、急にどうしたんだ？
translatedstr:
Yeah, thanks Amana .......
But what's going on all of a sudden?

source:
お仕事大変そうだったから、言いたくなったの。
えへへ、これからもよろしくね☆
translatedstr:
I just wanted to tell you because you seemed to be having a hard time at work.
Hehehe, I look forward to working with you in the future.

source:
甘奈たちのためなら、これくらいなんでもないよ。
こちらこそ、よろしくな！
translatedstr:
For Amana and the others, this is nothing.
Nice to meet you too!

source:
プロデューサーさん、おはようございまーすっ！
今から事務所行くとこ？
translatedstr:
Good morning, producers!
Are you on your way to the office now?

source:
あ、プロデューサーさんだ！
おっはよー！
translatedstr: Good morning!

source:
あ、プロデューサーさん！　お疲れさまっ☆
明日もよろしくお願いしますっ！
translatedstr:
Ah, Producer-san!
I look forward to working with you tomorrow!

source:
甘奈、今日はね、帰ったら甜花ちゃんと一緒に
ゲームするんだ～☆
translatedstr:
Amana, today, when I get home, I'm going to be with Tenka-chan.
We're going to play a game!

source: （休憩中の甘奈に声をかけてみよう……）
translatedstr: (Talk to Amana during her break: ......)

source: 甘奈、レッスンの調子はどうだ？
translatedstr: Amana, how are your lessons going?

source:
プロデューサーさん！　うん、順調だよ～。
みんなめっちゃ魅力的だし、甘奈も頑張らなきゃ☆
translatedstr:
Producer! Yeah, it's going well!
Everyone is so attractive, and I have to do my best, too.

source:
あいかわらず、甘奈は真面目だな。
そうだ、誰か気になるメンバーはいるか？
translatedstr:
As usual, Amana is serious.
Yes, is there any member who cares?

source:
みんな気になるけど、一番は伊織ちゃんかなっ！
すっごいお嬢様って感じだし、やっぱ憧れちゃうよね
translatedstr:
I'm interested in all of them, but I think Iori is the best!
She looks like a very young lady, and I'm sure I'd adore her.

source:
（どうやら伊織のことが気になるようだな。
甘奈が憧れるところっていうと……）
translatedstr:
(Apparently, you are concerned about Iori.
(......) when it comes to places that Amana admires.

source: 素直じゃない
translatedstr: not honest

source: おでこ
translatedstr: forehead

source: ワガママ
translatedstr: selfishness

source: 憧れるって、伊織の素直じゃないところにか？
translatedstr: Admire, you mean, Iori's not being honest?

source:
そうそう！　さっすがプロデューサーさん！
まさに伊織ちゃんって感じで、超かわい～よね☆
translatedstr:
Yes, yes! You are a great producer!
She's just like Iori, so cute!

source: 憧れるって、伊織のおでこを出す髪型のことか？
translatedstr: By "admire," do you mean Iori's forehead-baring haircut?

source:
うん、素敵な髪型だよね！
おでこは伊織ちゃんのチャームポイントだもん
translatedstr:
Yeah, it's a nice haircut!
Iori's forehead is her charm point.

source: 憧れるって、伊織のワガママなところか？
translatedstr: Admiring is Iori's selfishness?

source:
そんなところも、伊織ちゃんの魅力のひとつだよね！
でも、みんなが本当に困ることは言わないの！
translatedstr:
That's part of Iori's charm!
But I don't say things that really bother people!

source:
それにね、甘奈や甜花ちゃんがミスしちゃった時は、
さりげなくフォローしてくれるの☆
translatedstr:
Besides, when Amana or Tenka-chan made a mistake,
They follow me casually.

source:
伊織は面倒見がいいからな。なんだかんだ言って、
周りのこともしっかり見てくれてるんだよ
translatedstr:
Iori takes good care of me, for what it's worth,
They've got a good eye for what's going on around them.

source:
プロデューサーさんも、頼りにしてるんだね……！
他のみんなのことも、もっともーっと知りたいなっ
translatedstr:
You're relying on your producer, too. ......
I'd like to know more about everyone else!

source:
（甘奈とふたりで、事務所の備品の買い出しに
来ている……）
translatedstr:
(Amana and I went shopping for supplies for the office.
(It's coming: ......)

source:
……よし、予定より早く終わったな。
甘奈の手際がよくて助かったよ、ありがとう
translatedstr:
...... Okay, you're ahead of schedule.
Amana did a great job with this, thank you.

source:
どういたしまして！　でも、こちらこそ
荷物持ってくれてありがとうだよっ！
translatedstr:
You're welcome, but it's my pleasure.
Thanks for carrying my luggage!

source:
これくらい当然だよ。
そういえば、甘奈はショッピングとか好きだったよな
translatedstr:
This much is obvious.
Come to think of it, Amana liked shopping and stuff.

source:
そうだよー！　普段はネイルショップに行ったり、
ウィンドウショッピングをするのが、好きなんだ♪
translatedstr:
Yes! I usually go to nail stores,
I like to window shop... ♪ I like to window shop ♪

source:
そうなんだな。じゃあ、今日のレッスンまでは
まだ時間があるし、少し洋服でも見に行くか？
translatedstr:
Right, well, until today's lesson.
There's still time to go and look at some clothes.

source:
えっいいの？　やったぁ！　なら、せっかくだし
プロデューサーさんオススメのお店に行きたいな！
translatedstr:
Oh, you don't mind? Yes! Well, I'll take my chances.
I'd like to go to the restaurant recommended by the producer!

source:
俺のおすすめの店！？
あまりファッションに詳しくないけど、そうだな……
translatedstr:
My recommendation!
I don't know much about fashion, but yes ......

source: 流行りのお店
translatedstr: Trendy stores

source: 穴場のお店
translatedstr: A hole in the wall store

source: いつものお店
translatedstr: Usual stores

source:
たしかこの近くに、若い女の子の間で流行ってる
評判の店があったと思うんだが……
translatedstr:
I think there's a place near here that's popular among young girls.
I think I found a reputable restaurant: ......

source:
あ！　そのお店、甘奈もこの前雑誌で見たかも！
どれもかわいくて、めっちゃ気になってたんだ～！
translatedstr:
Oh! I think I might have seen that restaurant in a magazine the other day!
They were all so cute and I was really curious about them!

source:
この前教えてもらったんだが、この先の路地裏に
品揃えがマニアックな穴場の店があるらしいんだ
translatedstr:
I was told the other day that there's an alleyway down the street.
I heard there's a hole-in-the-wall store with a maniacal selection.

source:
そうなの？　そんなお店、甘奈も知らなかったよ。
でも、新しいとこも開拓したいし、行ってみたいな！
translatedstr:
Really? I didn't even know such a restaurant existed, Amana.
But I'd like to explore new places and go there!

source:
甘奈が普段行っている店にしないか？
甘奈の好みも、知っておきたいし……
translatedstr:
Why don't we go to the restaurant Amana usually goes to?
I'd also like to know Amana's preferences: ......

source:
うん、分かった。いつもチェックしてるショップの
新作が出たところだったんだ～
translatedstr:
Yeah, okay, I'm always checking out the stores.
I just got a new one!

source:
あ、でも甘奈だけ楽しんじゃったら申し訳ないかも。
だから、今度はみんなでショッピングしようね☆
translatedstr:
Oh, but I might be sorry if only Amana enjoys it.
So let's all go shopping together this time☆.

source: 分かったよ。それじゃあ行こうか
translatedstr: All right, let's go then.

source:
（甘奈の次の仕事だが、候補がいくつかあるな……。
ちょうど本人もいるし、希望を聞いてみるか）
translatedstr:
(Amana's next job, but you have a few candidates. ......
(Just in person. Let's see what she wants.)

source: 甘奈、ちょっといいか？
translatedstr: Amana, can I have a word?

source:
うん、大丈夫だよ☆
どしたの？　プロデューサーさん
translatedstr:
Yeah, I'm fine.
What's up, producer?

source:
次の仕事について考えてるんだが、
どんな仕事をしている時が、楽しいんだ？
translatedstr:
I'm thinking about my next job,
What kind of work do you enjoy doing?

source:
ん～……全部楽しいけど、やっぱり
ファンのみんなと交流できるお仕事の時、かな！
translatedstr:
Hmmm... ...... all fun, but still...
Maybe when I'm at a job where I can interact with all my fans!

source:
なるほど。
それなら、甘奈に向いている仕事は……
translatedstr: Then the right job for Amana is ......

source: 握手会
translatedstr: handshake event

source: バスツアー
translatedstr: bus tour

source: ラジオ番組
translatedstr: radio program

source:
握手会なんてどうだ？
ファンと距離が近いし、ピッタリじゃないか？
translatedstr:
How about a handshake?
It's close to the fans, and isn't that perfect?

source:
いいねっ！　ファンのみんなと直接お話するの
すっごく楽しいもん☆
translatedstr:
I love it! I get to talk to all the fans in person.
It's so much fun!

source: ファンのみんなと行く、バスツアーなんてどうだ？
translatedstr: How about a bus tour with all the fans?

source:
バスツアーかぁ。ファンのみんなと
旅行に行ったら、素敵な思い出ができそう！
translatedstr:
Bus tour with all the fans
If you go on a trip, you will have great memories!

source: ラジオ番組なんかもありかもな
translatedstr: Maybe a radio show.

source:
なるほど……。ファンのみんなからの
お便りを読むのも、立派な交流だもんね
translatedstr:
I see. ....... from all the fans.
Reading your letters is a great way to interact with each other, isn't it?

source:
でも、甘奈のことを待っててくれる人がいるなら、
どんなお仕事だって、めーっちゃ頑張っちゃうよ☆
translatedstr:
But if there is someone waiting for Amana,
I'll do my very best in any job!

source:
その意気込みなら安心だな。
次の仕事も期待していてくれ
translatedstr:
With that kind of enthusiasm, I'm relieved.
Stay tuned for the next job.

source:
（甘奈が自主レッスンしていると聞いたので、
少し様子を見に来た……）
translatedstr:
(I heard that Amana was giving a voluntary lesson,
(I'm here to see how things are going a little ......)

source:
あっ、プロデューサーさん！　今ちょうど、
休憩しようと思ってたんだ～、えへへっ♪
translatedstr:
Oh, producer! Just now,
I thought I'd take a break~, eheheheh♪

source:
甘奈、お疲れ様。ずいぶん機嫌がいいな。
なにか良いことでもあったのか？
translatedstr:
Amana, good job, you are in a very good mood.
What's the good news?

source:
大当たり～！　実はね、今さっき甜花ちゃんが、
差し入れを持ってきてくれたんだ☆
translatedstr:
Bingo~! As a matter of fact, just now, Tenka-chan-chan,
They brought me some goodies☆.

source:
飲み物やタオル、甘いものまであるな。
なるほど、どおりで機嫌がいいわけだ。甜花は……
translatedstr:
You've got drinks, towels, and even something sweet.
I see, no wonder she's in a good mood, Tenka is ......

source: さすがお姉さん
translatedstr: That's my girl.

source: まるでお母さん
translatedstr: She's like a mother.

source: さすが妹
translatedstr: That's my sister.

source: さすが、甘奈のお姉さんだな！
translatedstr: That's Amana's sister!

source:
うん！　めっちゃかわいくって、めっちゃ優しい、
甘奈の自慢のお姉ちゃんなんだよ☆
translatedstr:
Yes! She is very cute and very kind,
She's Amana's proud big sister.

source:
こんなにたくさんの差し入れを持ってくるなんて、
まるでお母さんみたいだな
translatedstr:
I can't believe you brought so many goodies,
You sound like your mother.

source:
甜花ちゃんがお母さん……
えへへ、なんだか面白いかも☆
translatedstr:
Beetika is a mother: ......
Hehehe, it's kind of funny.

source: さすが、甘奈の妹だな
translatedstr: That's Amana's sister.

source:
甜花ちゃんは甘奈のお姉ちゃんだよ？　もしかして
プロデューサーさん、今まで逆だと思ってた……？
translatedstr:
Tetsuka is Amana's big sister, right? Maybe.
Producer, did you ever think it was the other way around ......?

source:
ごめん、冗談だ。もちろん分かってはいるんだが、
ふたりの振る舞いを見てたら、つい……な
translatedstr:
Sorry, I'm kidding, of course I know that,
I saw the way they were behaving, and I ended up going to .......

source:
最近の甜花ちゃん、すっごく頑張ってるんだもん。
甘奈も負けないように、しっかりやらないと！
translatedstr:
Tenka-chan is working very hard these days.
Amana has to do well not to be outdone!

source:
お互いのことを思いやって、頑張っているんだな。
ふたりとも偉いぞ！
translatedstr:
You are doing your best to take care of each other.
Great job, both of you!

source:
うん！　これからも、ふたりで一緒にがんばるね！
プロデューサーさんも、応援よろしくっ☆
translatedstr:
Yes! We will continue to do our best together!
Producers, too, please support us☆.

source:
（甘奈の仕事が早く終わったので、休憩も兼ねて、
近くのショッピングモールに来ている）
translatedstr:
(Amana's work finished early, so we took a break as well,
(They're at a nearby shopping mall.)

source:
あ！　あの服かわいー！
あっちのもすっごくイケてるよねっ
translatedstr:
Oh! Those clothes are so cute!
That one is really cool too!

source:
そうだな、どこを見てもお洒落な服ばかりだ……。
この服なんか、同じ形なのにいろんな柄があるんだな
translatedstr:
Yes, there are stylish clothes everywhere you look. ......
This dress, for example, has the same shape, but there are so many different patterns.

source:
ほんとだ～！　ねえ、プロデューサーさん！
甘奈には、どの柄が一番似合うと思う？
translatedstr:
It's true~! Hey, producer!
Which pattern do you think would look best on Amana?

source:
甘奈に一番似合う柄か……。
どれも似合うと思うが、ひとつ選ぶとすれば……
translatedstr:
Is this the most suitable pattern for Amana. ......
I think they all look great, but if I had to pick one, I'd go with ......

source: ゼブラ柄
translatedstr: zebra print

source: ヒョウ柄
translatedstr: leopard print (design)

source: ヘビ柄
translatedstr: serpentine

source:
このゼブラ柄なんか、落ち着いてて良いと思うぞ。
甘奈の大人っぽさが、より際立つんじゃないか？
translatedstr:
I think this zebra pattern is nice and calm.
Amana's maturity is more pronounced, don't you think?

source:
お、大人っぽい、かな……？　そっか……。
えへへ、ありがとっ、プロデューサーさん！
translatedstr:
Oh, it looks mature, doesn't it ......? I see. .......
Ehehe, thanks, producer!

source:
お洒落については詳しくないが、この、ヒョウ柄？
みたいなのが、俺はかっこいいと思うぞ
translatedstr:
I don't know much about fashion, but this, leopard print?
You know, something like that would be cool with me.

source:
これはね、レオパード柄って言ったりもするんだ～。
プロデューサーさんはこういうのが好きなんだね
translatedstr:
This is, you know, sometimes called a leopard pattern~.
I see your producer likes this kind of thing.

source:
そうだな……こういうヘビ柄の服はどうだろう？
普段あまり着てないんじゃないか
translatedstr:
Yes, ...... what about these snake print clothes?
You don't usually wear much.

source:
あはは、ファッションとしては素敵なんだけど……。
実は甘奈、ヘビがちょっと苦手なんだよね……
translatedstr:
Haha, it's a nice fashion statement. ......
Actually, Amana, I'm a little afraid of snakes: ......

source:
ともかく、甘奈ならどれも似合うと思うぞ。
気に入ったのがあれば、試着してみるか？
translatedstr:
Anyway, I think Amana would look great in any of them.
If you like it, do you want to try it on?

source:
ん～、でも、試着すると欲しくなっちゃうから……
今はやめとこうかな、見てるだけでも十分楽しいし☆
translatedstr:
Hmmm... but I'll want to try it on. ......
I think I'll stop now, it's fun enough just to watch*.

source:
そうか、節約することまで考えてるなんて、
やっぱり甘奈はしっかりしているな
translatedstr:
Oh yeah, I can't believe you're even thinking about saving money,
I knew Amana was solid.

source:
（甘奈がひとりでなにかを練習しているようだ。
声をかけてみよう）
translatedstr:
(It seems that Amana is practicing something on her own.
(Let's call out to her.)

source: 甘奈、なにをしているんだ？
translatedstr: Amana, what are you doing?

source:
いまね、ルミナスでモノマネが流行ってるんだ～！
甘奈も練習したから、誰か当ててみてよ☆
translatedstr:
Right now, mimicry is very popular at Luminous!
Amana has practiced too, so guess who☆.

source: モノマネか。分かった、当ててみせるぞ！
translatedstr: I'll guess!

source:
『プロデューサー！　おはようございまーす！
今日も一日、ガツーンといきますよ！　へへっ！』
translatedstr:
Good morning, producer!
I'm going to go all out today, too!

source:
ふむ……。
今のモノマネは……
translatedstr:
Hmmm. .......
The current moniker is ......

source: 真
translatedstr: Makoto

source: 菜々
translatedstr: Nana

source: 未来
translatedstr: Mirai

source:
ずばり……、真だな！
似てたぞ、甘奈！
translatedstr:
Zubari ......, true!
You look like her, Amana!

source:
すごーい！　正解だよ～プロデューサーさん！
えへへっ、練習してよかった☆
translatedstr:
Awesome! You're right - producer!
Hehehe, I'm glad I practiced.

source:
（よし、ちゃんと当てられたみたいだ。
甘奈も自信がついたみたいだし、よかったな）
translatedstr:
(Okay, it looks like I guessed correctly.
(Good for Amana, she's gaining confidence.)

source: ずばり……、菜々だな！
translatedstr: Zubari ......, Nana!

source:
残念でした、外れだよ～☆　プロデューサーさんが
分からないんじゃ、もっともっと練習しなきゃだね
translatedstr:
I'm sorry, it's an outlier~☆ Producer.
If you don't know, then you need to practice a lot more.

source:
（うーん、外してしまった……。
甘奈もすこし残念そうだし、やってしまった……）
translatedstr:
(Hmmm, I missed it. .......
Amana looks a little disappointed, too, and she did it ......)

source: 今のモノマネは、ずばり……、未来だな！
translatedstr: The moniker now is Zubari ......, the future!

source:
違うよー。ううーん、
もっとしっかり観察しないとダメかなぁ
translatedstr:
No...hmmm..,
I guess I need to observe more closely.

source: （違ったか……。一体誰だったんだろう）
translatedstr: (Or not. ....... Who the hell was that?)

source:
（どうやら今、ルミナスの中で、
モノマネが流行っているらしい……）
translatedstr:
(Apparently, now in Luminous,
(I hear the moniker is popular: ......)

source:
プロデューサーさん！
甘奈、今からモノマネするから、誰か当ててみて☆
translatedstr:
Producer!
Amana, I'm going to do an imitation now, so guess who it is☆.

source:
わかった。絶対に当てるぞ！
いいぞ、やってみてくれ
translatedstr:
Okay, I'll definitely hit it!
Good, go for it.

source: いっくよ～
translatedstr: Here we go!

source: なるほど。今の仕草は、おそらく……
translatedstr: I see...now that gesture is probably ......

source: 甜花
translatedstr: Tenka

source: 雪歩
translatedstr: Yukiho

source: 蘭子
translatedstr: Ranko

source:
分かったぞ、今の仕草、甜花のモノマネだろ！
さすが双子だな……そっくりだったぞ！
translatedstr:
I get it, now that's a gesture, an imitation of Tenka!
You're right, twins. ...... They looked exactly alike!

source:
えへへ、大正解～☆
これだけは、誰にも負けない自信あるんだ～
translatedstr:
Hehehe, you are so right~☆☆☆.
I'm confident that I can beat anyone at this!

source:
（正解できてよかった。
披露できて、甘奈も上機嫌みたいだ）
translatedstr:
(I'm glad I got it right.
(Amana seems to be in a good mood now that she has been able to show off her skills.)

source: 今の仕草、もしかして雪歩のモノマネか？
translatedstr: Is that a gesture now, perhaps an imitation of Yukihos?

source:
違うよ～。けどどうしてだろう……
似てるところがあるのかな……
translatedstr:
No - but I don't know why: ......
I wonder if there are similarities: ......

source:
（甘奈、思ったより落ち込んでるな……。
もしかして深読みしすぎたか……？）
translatedstr:
(Amana, you're more depressed than I thought. ......
(Perhaps I'm reading too much into this ......?)

source: 今の仕草、もしかして蘭子のモノマネか……？
translatedstr: Is that gesture now an impersonation of Ranko or ......?

source:
はっずれー。ううーん、これだけは
絶対似てるって、思ったんだけどな……
translatedstr:
Hashishoo...ummmm...only this one...
I thought for sure they look alike. ......

source:
（うーん、違ったか。
次は正解するぞ……！）
translatedstr:
(Hmmm, wrong.
(I'll get it right next time: ......!)

source:
（書類の整理を終えると、甘奈が近づいてきた。
じゃんけんの相手をしてほしいらしい）
translatedstr:
(As I finished sorting through the paperwork, Amana approached me.
(She wants you to play rock-paper-scissors-paper with her.)

source:
ちょうどいま仕事が終わったところだから、
別にかまわないが……急にどうしたんだ？
translatedstr:
I'm just finishing up work right now,
I don't mind, but what's up with ...... all of a sudden?

source:
疲れてる時にごめんね！
けど、どうしてもじゃんけんしてほしいの！
translatedstr:
I'm sorry I'm so tired!
But I really want you to play rock-paper-scissors-paper with me!

source:
今度近くのゲーム屋さんでじゃんけん大会があって、
甜花ちゃんのために景品、絶対にゲットしたくて！
translatedstr:
There is a rock-paper-scissors-paper tournament at a nearby game store,
I wanted to get the prize for Tenka, for sure!

source:
なるほど、そのための練習がしたいんだな。
俺も全力で相手をするぞ！
translatedstr:
I see, you want to practice for that.
I'll do my best to deal with them too!

source: じゃーんけーん……
translatedstr: Janken: ......

source: 勝ちに行く
translatedstr: go for the win

source: あいこにする
translatedstr: do with favor (favour)

source: 勝ちを譲る
translatedstr: concede victory

source:
ポンッ！
俺が勝ったのはいいが……これで練習になったのか？
translatedstr:
Ponk!
I won, but ...... is this what you've been practicing?

source:
うん！　真剣勝負してくれたおかげで、勝ちに行く
オーラ？　みたいなのが、分かった気がするよ！
translatedstr:
Yeah! Thanks for the serious competition, I'm going to win.
I think I know what it's like!

source:
（……少し大人げなかった気もするが、結果的には、
甘奈に自信がついたみたいだし、よかったな）
translatedstr:
(...... I feel like it was a little immature, but as it turns out,
(Good for Amana for gaining confidence.)

source:
ポンッ！
あいこか……勝負がつかなかったな
translatedstr:
Ponk!
Aikoka...... didn't win the game.

source:
いい勝負だったってことだね。
プロデューサーさん！　また練習相手、お願いね！
translatedstr:
So it was a good match.
Producer! I'm looking forward to having you as my practice partner again!

source:
（甘奈のやる気は上がったみたいだし、
結果オーライかな）
translatedstr:
(Amana's motivation seems to have increased,
I guess it all worked out.)

source:
ポンッ。
よしよし、甘奈の勝ちだな
translatedstr:
Ponk.
Okay, okay, Amana wins.

source:
……プロデューサーさん、今わざと負けなかった？
手加減したらダメだよ～
translatedstr:
...... producer, didn't you just lose on purpose?
Don't go easy on her!

source:
（手を抜いたことが、甘奈にバレてしまった……。
甘奈はすこし不満そうだ、対応を間違えたな……）
translatedstr:
(Amana found out that I had cut corners. ......
Amana seems a little frustrated, you handled it wrong. ......)

source:
（甘奈の仕事終わり、
気分転換を兼ねて出かけることにした……）
translatedstr:
(Amana's end of work,
I decided to go out for a change (......)

source:
（もうこんな時間か……。
甘奈も楽しんでくれたようだな）
translatedstr:
(Is it that time already? .......
(I see Amana enjoyed it as well.)

source:
プロデューサーさん、今日は楽しかったー♪
また今度、一緒に気分転換しようね☆
translatedstr:
Producer, I had a great time today!
Let's change the mood together some other time.

source:
今日は素敵なところに連れて行ってくれて
ありがとー☆　甘奈、すごくドキドキしたよ！
translatedstr:
You took me to a wonderful place today.
Thanks ☆ Amana, I was very excited!

source:
（ブティックのキャンペーン企画の仕事で、
甘奈とブティックにやってきた）
translatedstr:
(For a campaign planning job for a boutique,
(I came to the boutique with Amana)

source:
……！　おしゃれな服がめっちゃいっぱい……！
これ、ぜーんぶ使っていいの！？
translatedstr:
......! There are so many fashionable clothes at ......!
You can use all of this!

source:
ああ、今日の企画は『甘奈のオススメコーデ☆』が
テーマだからな。甘奈のコーデを紹介しよう
translatedstr:
Oh, today's project is "Amana's Recommended Codes☆".
That's the theme...here's some of Amana's coords.

source:
やったぁ！
えへへ、どんなのにしよっかなぁ☆
translatedstr:
Yay!
Hehehe, what should I make?

source:
……あ！　このブラウスかわいー！
トレンドも押さえてるし、色々と合わせやすそう！
translatedstr:
...... Oh! This blouse is so cute!
It's on-trend and easy to match with many other things!

source:
こっちは甜花ちゃんが着たら似合いそう……！
あの帽子と一緒に……うん！　絶対かわいー！
translatedstr:
This one would look good if Tenka-chan wore it. ......
I'm with that hat: ...... Yeah! Absolutely adorable!

source:
あっちは和柄だね。すっごく綺麗だけど
あんまりそういうコーデやらないから……できるかな
translatedstr:
The other side has Japanese patterns, though they are very beautiful.
I don't do that kind of coding very often, so I wonder if I can ......

source:
あ、子ども用の服もあるんだ！　小さいサイズなのに
デザインもしっかりしてて、いい感じ！
translatedstr:
Oh, they have clothes for kids, too! They're small sizes.
It's well designed and nice!

source:
けど、これだけ種類があると、迷っちゃうなぁ。
プロデューサーさんは、どんなコーデがいいと思う？
translatedstr:
But with so many different kinds, I'm not sure what to do.
What do you think the producer should coordinate?

source:
そうだな……。
甘奈の長所を活かせるコーデというと……
translatedstr: A cord that can take advantage of Amana's strengths is ......

source: 甜花に似合うコーデ
translatedstr: Codes suitable for Tenka

source: 今時のＪＫコーデ
translatedstr: JK Codes of the moment

source: 子ども向けのコーデ
translatedstr: Codes for children

source: 和風コーデ
translatedstr: Japanese-style codecs

source:
甜花に似合うコーデを、テーマにしたらどうだ？
身近な人をイメージした方が、やりやすいだろうし
translatedstr:
Why don't you make a theme out of the codecs that would look good on Tenka?
It would be easier to do this if you imagined someone familiar to you.

source:
さっきも甜花ちゃんに似合いそうなのは
すぐ考えられたもんね……！
translatedstr:
I was thinking earlier that it would look good on Tenka.
You thought of it right away. ......

source:
ありがと！　その方法でやってみる☆
よーし、頑張るぞ～！
translatedstr:
Thanks! I'll try it that way☆.
Okay, I'll do my best!

source:
どんどん思いつくよ☆
えへへ、止まらなくなっちゃうね！
translatedstr:
I'm coming up with more and more.
Ehehe, I can't stop, can I?

source:
(甘奈はマネキンが足りなくなるほどのコーデを
どんどん作り、イベントは大いに盛り上がった！）
translatedstr:
(Amana has so many cords that she runs out of mannequins.
The event was a lot of fun!)

source:
(甘奈と甜花の仲良しっぷりもネットで話題になり、
また更に仕事が増えたぞ！)
translatedstr:
(The friendship between Amana and Tianhua also became a hot topic on the Internet,
And even more work for you!!!)

source:
やっぱり今時の女の子に似合うコーデが
いいんじゃないか？　みんな参考になるしな！
translatedstr:
After all, a cord that suits today's girls is a good choice.
That's good, isn't it? It's helpful for all of us!

source:
それが一番かもね……！
うん！　かわいーコーデがたくさんできそう☆
translatedstr:
That's probably best. ......
I'm sure I'll have lots of cute outfits.

source:
これには、これを合わせてっと……できた！
うん、ばっちり！　次、いっくよー！
translatedstr:
I was able to ...... this together!
Yes, perfect! I'm going next time!

source:
(その後も甘奈らしいコーデを作り続け、
キャンペーンも若い女の子から非常に好評だった！)
translatedstr:
(After that, she continued to make codecs that were typical of Amana,
The campaign was also extremely well received by young girls!)

source:
せっかく子ども用の服も置いてあることだし、
小さい子向けのコーデを考えてみたらどうだ？
translatedstr:
And now that we have children's clothes, too,
Why don't you come up with some codecs for the little ones?

source:
子ども向けのコーデかぁ。
やってみたことないけど、チャレンジしてみようかな
translatedstr:
Codes for children, huh?
I've never tried it, but I'll give it a shot.

source:
(いくつか作るものの、想定ターゲットより
大人びてしまい、イマイチな出来になってしまった)
translatedstr:
(Although we make some of them, they are more than the expected target.
It was matured and not as good as it could have been.)

source:
(その後も試行錯誤したものの納得のいくコーデが
できず、キャンペーンの評判もいまいちだった)
translatedstr:
(After that, I was able to find a satisfactory coding despite trial and error.
It was not possible, and the campaign was not well-received.)

source:
そうだな、和風のコーデにしてみたらどうだ？
新しいことに挑戦してみるのも大切だからな
translatedstr:
Yes, why don't you try a Japanese style cord?
It's important to try new things.

source:
うん……！
初めてだけど、頑張ってみる……！
translatedstr:
Yeah. ......!
I'm new to this, but I'll try my best. ......

source:
(その後、甘奈は慣れないコーデに苦戦してしまい、
キャンペーンの公開は延期になってしまった……)
translatedstr:
(After that, Amana struggled with the unfamiliar cordiality,
The release of the campaign has been postponed: ......)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)

source: 甘奈のミニライブが決まったぞ！
translatedstr: Amana's got a mini live show coming up!

source:
本当！？　やったぁ！　
めーっちゃうれしい！
translatedstr:
Really!
I am so happy!

source:
しかも今回はソロだ！
それができるくらい、ファンがいるって証拠だな！
translatedstr:
And this time it's solo!
That's proof that you have enough fans to do that!

source:
えへへ。
いつも応援してくれるみんなに、感謝しないとだね！
translatedstr:
Heh heh.
I should thank everyone who always supports me!

source:
そうだな。甘奈の希望も取り入れやすくなるし、
何かやりたいことがあったら、どんどん言ってくれ
translatedstr:
Yes, it would be easier to incorporate Amana's wishes,
If there's something you want to do, just keep telling me.

source:
ホント？　それなら早速
相談したいことがあるんだけど、いいかな？
translatedstr:
Really? Well, then, let's get to it.
I'd like to discuss something with you, if you don't mind.

source:
俺でよければいくらでも聞くぞ。
どうしたんだ？
translatedstr: I'll ask as many questions as you want if it's okay with me.

source:
ソロのライブって、いつも以上に
ファンのみんなとの距離感が近くなるでしょ？
translatedstr:
Solo gigs are more than usual.
You'll feel closer to all your fans, right?

source:
だから、みんなで一緒のステージを
作りたいなって……。えっと……
translatedstr:
So, we're all on stage together.
I wanted to make a ..........um.........

source:
ああ、なるほど
一体感のあるステージにしたいってことかな
translatedstr:
Oh, I see.
I guess they want to create a stage of togetherness.

source: ！　うん！
translatedstr: Yes, I know!

source:
どうしたらいいかな？
プロデューサーさん、何かアイディアある？
translatedstr:
What should I do?
Producers, any ideas?

source:
なるほど、次のミニライブの工夫か……。
それなら……
translatedstr: I see...the ingenuity of the next mini-live. ......

source: 一緒に歌う
translatedstr: Sing with me

source: ＭＣを工夫する
translatedstr: Devise an MC

source: たくさん歌う
translatedstr: sing a lot

source: 普段通り
translatedstr: as usual

source:
それなら、ファンと一緒に歌うのはどうだ？
ライブはコールアンドレスポンスが大切だからな
translatedstr:
Then how about singing along with the fans?
Live music is all about call and response.

source:
すっごくいいかも……！　あ、それなら
セットリストも一度、甘奈が考えてみていい？
translatedstr:
It could be very nice. ......! Oh, that's a good idea.
Can Amana come up with a set list once?

source: もちろん。協力して良いライブにしような
translatedstr: Sure. Let's work together to make it a good show.

source:
えへへ♪　ありがと、プロデューサーさん！
甘奈、頑張っちゃうね☆
translatedstr:
Ehehe♪ Thanks, producer!
Amana, I'll do my best.

source:
(甘奈の声掛けによって、次の曲は大合唱になった。
会場が一体となり、ライブは大いに盛り上がった！)
translatedstr:
(Amana's call led to a big chorus for the next song.
The venue was united and the live show was a great success!)

source:
(ファンは大喜びで、甘奈も満足そうだった。
次はもっと大きな会場でやれそうだ！)
translatedstr:
(The fans were delighted, and Amana seemed satisfied.
Maybe next time we can do it in a bigger venue!)

source:
それなら、ＭＣを工夫してみるのはどうだ？
トークだって甘奈の立派な武器のひとつだからな
translatedstr:
Then how about getting creative with the MCs?
Talk is another of Amana's fine weapons.

source:
そっか、ライブの醍醐味は歌だけじゃないもんね！
さすがプロデューサーさんだね☆
translatedstr:
I see. The best part of a live concert is not only the singing!
That's what I'd expect from a producer.

source:
ライブがもっと楽しくなるＭＣ、考えてみるっ！
みんな、喜んでくれるといいな♪
translatedstr:
I'll think of an MC that will make the live show more enjoyable!
I hope you everyone are happy...

source:
(ライブ当日、甘奈のＭＣで曲間も飽きることなく、
最初から最後まで楽しめる良いライブになった！)
translatedstr:
(On the day of the concert, Amana's MC kept me going between songs,
It turned out to be a good show that I enjoyed from start to finish!)

source:
それなら、みんなが楽しくなれる元気な曲を、
たくさん歌うライブにしてみよう
translatedstr:
Then, we need energetic songs that everyone can enjoy,
Let's make it a live show with lots of singing.

source:
うん、それならメドレーも取り入れてみようかな。
セットリストも考えてみるね！
translatedstr:
Yeah, I'll try to incorporate a medley then.
I'll see what I can come up with for a set list!

source:
(甘奈の元気な歌が多く聞けてファンは喜んだが、
後半は甘奈もみんなも疲れてしまった……)
translatedstr:
(Fans were pleased to hear many of Amana's energetic songs, though,
Amana and everyone else got tired in the second half: ......)

source:
俺は普段通りが一番だと思うぞ。それよりも、
今は歌やダンスのレッスンに集中しよう
translatedstr:
I think it's best if things are business as usual, more than that,
Let's focus on singing and dancing lessons for now.

source:
(その後、甘奈は普段通りにライブをこなしたが、
甘奈自身は内容に満足できなかったみたいだ……)
translatedstr:
(After that, Amana performed as usual, though,
Amana herself was not satisfied with the content: ......)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)

source:
（甘奈の次の仕事の打ち合わせで、
カフェに来ている……）
translatedstr:
(At a meeting for Amana's next job,
(You're at the cafe: ......)

source:
次の甘奈の仕事は、風邪予防の強化月間を
呼びかけるＣＭだな！
translatedstr:
Next Amana's job is to strengthen Cold Prevention Month.
It's a commercial that calls for it!

source:
えへへ。
撮影、楽しみだな～☆
translatedstr:
Heh heh.
I'm looking forward to the shoot!

source: でも、どーして甘奈が選ばれたのかな？
translatedstr: But why was Amana chosen?

source:
甘奈の明るくて元気なイメージが、
ＣＭの方向性と合っていたのかもしれないな
translatedstr:
Amana's bright and cheerful image,
Maybe that was in line with the direction of the commercial.

source:
えへへ、そうだったら
うれしーな
translatedstr:
Heh heh, if that's the case.
I'm so happy.

source:
あ、そうだ。風邪の予防に関連した服なら
撮影の衣装はこっちで決めていいらしいぞ
translatedstr:
Ah, yes, if it's clothing related to preventing colds.
They say we can decide what to wear for the shoot.

source:
そうなんだね……うーん……。
プロデューサーさんはどんなのがいいと思う？
translatedstr:
I see that. ...... hmmm .......
What do you think the producer would like?

source:
せっかくだし、
甘奈が自由に考えてみたらどうだ？
translatedstr:
I'm going to go out on a limb here,
Amana should feel free to think about it.

source: プロデューサーさんの意見を聞いてみたいな！
translatedstr: I'd like to hear what the producer has to say!

source:
たくさんのアイディアから選んだ方が、
いいものができそうだから！
translatedstr:
You should choose from a lot of ideas,
Because I think I can make something good!

source:
あ！　でも、頼ってばかりはズルいね……！
とりあえず思いつくのは……
translatedstr:
Ah! But it's not fair to rely on them all the time. ......
For now, all I can think of is ......

source:
まず、看護師さん！　ヒネリはないけど、
オーソドックスなの、いいと思う！
translatedstr:
First of all, the nurses! Not a twitch, though,
Orthodox, I think it's good!

source:
あとは、白衣の女医さんとか、かっこいいよね！
メガネとかかけちゃってみたり！
translatedstr:
And then there are cool things like female doctors in white coats!
I put on glasses or something!

source:
あとは……パジャマとか……？
いっぱい寝るのも予防だし……
translatedstr:
And then there's ...... pajamas or ......?
It's also preventative to sleep a lot. ......

source:
甘奈が思いつくのはこれくらいだね。
プロデューサーさん、どうかな？
translatedstr:
That's about all Amana can come up with.
Producers, what do you think?

source:
今、甘奈の考えてくれたので
十分いけそうだけど
translatedstr:
Now that you've given it some thought Amana.
I think it's good enough.

source:
ありがと！　でもやっぱり意見欲しいな！
決め手があるとうれしいから
translatedstr:
Thanks, but I still want your opinion!
Because it's nice to have a deciding factor.

source:
うーん……それなら、
次のＣＭで甘奈が着る衣装は……
translatedstr:
Hmmm ...... then,
The outfit that Amana will wear in the next commercial is ......

source: 白衣とメガネ
translatedstr: White Coat and Glasses

source: 看護師の服
translatedstr: Nurses' Clothing

source: かわいいパジャマ
translatedstr: Cute pajamas

source: セクシーな水着
translatedstr: Sexy swimwear

source:
白衣がいいんじゃないか？　メガネも合わせて、
いつもとは違った甘奈の魅力が出ると思うぞ
translatedstr:
I think a white coat would be nice. Glasses to go with it,
I think it will bring out a different kind of Amana's charm.

source:
ギャップは大事だもんね！　えへへ、分かった！
プロデューサーさんが言うなら、そうしてみる！
translatedstr:
Gaps are important, aren't they! Heh, heh, I get it!
If the producer says so, I'll do it!

source:
かっこいい女医さんをイメージして、
クールに決めちゃうね☆
translatedstr:
Imagine a cool female doctor,
I'm going to be cool.

source:
(ＣＭのメガネと白衣姿の甘奈は、普段と違う印象で
かなり話題になったぞ！)
translatedstr:
(Amana in her glasses and white coat in the commercial gives a different impression than usual.
That's quite a buzz!)

source: (ＣＭも大いに注目されて、仕事の幅も広がった！)
translatedstr: (The commercials also attracted a great deal of attention and work!)

source:
悩むけど……看護師の服にしよう。
やっぱり王道が一番だ、うん。間違いない！
translatedstr:
I'm torn, but I'll go with ...... nurses' clothing.
After all, the high road is the best, no doubt about it!

source:
色んな人に予防を意識してほしいもんね！
イメージしやすいのが一番だと思う！
translatedstr:
I want people to be aware of prevention!
I think the best way is to make it easy to imagine!

source: ああ、わかりやすさで勝負しよう！
translatedstr: Yeah, let's play with clarity!

source:
うん！　ありがとっ！
一生懸命考えてくれたの、めっちゃうれしかった☆
translatedstr:
Thanks!
I was so happy that she thought so hard about it.

source:
(予想通り、甘奈の看護師姿がかわいいと
評判になり、ＣＭも大勢の人の目に触れたぞ！)
translatedstr:
(As expected, I thought Amana looked cute as a nurse.
You've got the word out, and your commercials have been seen by a lot of people!)

source:
次のＣＭの衣装は、パジャマにしてみよう。
撮影までに甘奈に似合いそうなものを選んでおくよ
translatedstr:
Let's try pajamas for the next commercial outfit.
I'll pick out something that will look good on Amana before the shoot.

source:
うん！　プロデューサーさんが選んでくれた
パジャマ、着るの楽しみだな！
translatedstr:
Yeah! The producer picked it out for me.
Pajamas, I'm looking forward to wearing them!

source:
(その後、甘奈のパジャマ姿が
かわいいと評判になった)
translatedstr:
(Then, Amana's pajamas were on.
It got a reputation for being cute.)

source:
(しかしＣＭの内容には合っていなかったようで、
風邪予防についてはあまり周知されなかった……)
translatedstr:
(But it didn't seem to fit the commercial,
Not much was known about cold prevention: ......)

source:
セクシーな水着にしよう。
インパクトで勝負だ！
translatedstr:
Let's make it a sexy swimsuit.
It's all about impact!

source:
え？　水着？
風邪予防と関係なくない？
translatedstr:
What? Swimsuit?
Doesn't it have anything to do with preventing colds?

source:
(ＣＭの内容に合わないとして衣装が変更になり、
撮影時間が大幅に押して、怒られてしまった……)
translatedstr:
(The costume was changed as it did not fit the commercial,
I got pissed off because I pushed the shooting time so far: ......)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)
